meanings.definition: A person who attains or achieves something.
meanings.sent1: The attainers in the race crossed the finish line with big smiles.
meanings.sent2: The attainers of the top scores were awarded certificates.
meanings.sent3: The attainers of the treasure chest celebrated with a joyful dance.
meanings.sent4: She was a true attainer of knowledge, always eager to learn more.
meanings.sent5: The attainers of the mountain peak enjoyed the breathtaking view.

meanings.definition: The act of attaining or reaching a goal.
meanings.sent1: Hard work and dedication are key to successful attainers.
meanings.sent2: The attainers of high grades studied diligently every day.
meanings.sent3: The attainers of the finish line were cheered on by the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The attainers of the summit faced many challenges along the way.
meanings.sent5: The attainers of their dreams never gave up despite obstacles.
